summary: DT: THE TIRES HAD TREAD SEPARATION, THREE OF THE FOUR WERE SEPARATING. THE MANUFACTURER ONLY REPLACED THE THREE THAT SEPARATED AND THE CONSUMER HAD TO PAY FOR THE BALANCE AND THE MOUNTING. THERE WAS SOME DAMAGE DONE WIRING AND BODY OF THE CAMPER FOR THE FIRST THREE TIRES THAT SEPARATED. THIS IS MANUFACTURED BY PILGRIM INTERNATIONAL, MODEL IS OPEN ROAD 357. ITS NOT LISTED.   *NM *JB
